text: The Eternal Duo! is a 2019 live duo concert recording of jazz pianist Toshiko Akiyoshi and tenor saxophonist / flutist Lew Tabackin. ==Track listing== :All compositions by Toshiko Akiyoshi except as indicated Disk 1 (CD, afternoon performance – audio) # "Long Yellow Road" – 7:00 # Talk 1 – 4:34 # "Tales Of A Courtesan (Oirantan)" – 10:09 # "Body And Soul" (Green, ...) – 4:22 # "The Village" – 5:26 # "Autumn Sea" – 7:43 # Talk 2 – 1:45 # "Eulogy" – 8:03 # Talk 3 – 1:12 # "Lady Liberty" – 5:52 # Talk 4 – 3:03 # "Hope" (From "Hiroshima, Rising From The Abyss") – 3:14 # "Tsuki No Sabaku" (Sasaki) – 3:13 # "Hangin` Loose" – 3:48 Disk 2 (Blu-ray, evening performance – video) # Opening – 0:43 # "Long Yellow Road" – 7:06 # Talk 1 – 5:43 # "Tales Of A Courtesan (Oirantan)" – 11:02 # "Body And Soul" (Green, ...) – 4:27 # "The Village" – 6:03 # "Autumn Sea" – 7:55 # Talk 2 – 1:23 # "Eulogy" – 8:13 # Talk 3 – 1:14 # "Lady Liberty" – 6:04 # Talk 4 – 3:12 # "Hope" (From "Hiroshima, Rising From The Abyss") – 3:58 # "Tsuki No Sabaku" (Sasaki) – 3:18 # "Hangin` Loose" – 4:30 # "Take the 'A' Train" (Strayhorn) – 6:37 # End Credits – 0:59 Bonus : Interview - Toshiko Akiyoshi & Lew Tabackin – 47:58 ==Personnel== * Toshiko Akiyoshi – piano (except "Body and Soul") * Lew Tabackin – tenor saxophone, flute (except "The Village") ==References / external links== * Sony Records Int'l – SICX30081~2 * The Eternal Duo! at discogs.com * The Eternal Duo! at dustygroove.com ==References== Category:Toshiko Akiyoshi albums Category:Lew Tabackin albums Category:Collaborative albums Category:2019 albums
title: The Eternal Duo!
